location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Major Charles Grant, 1 Assistant Resident to Lieutenant-Colonel Edward Charles Ross, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Political Resident that the Shaikh of Bahrain has issued orders to detain Hajee Abbas bin Mahomed [Hājjī ‘Abbās bin Aḥmad] until his accounts have been inspected, as originally requested by Ibrahim bin Rujub [Ibrāhīm bin Rajab] in an address to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf (see ff. 154-155).
